title: Project-Based Learning for Utilizing Generative AI in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematics concepts and basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Experimental use of generative AI tools and collaborative project implementation with personal devices

learning_goals: Generate at least five parameter-based math problems using generative AI tools and explain problem variation strategies.
Analyze AI-generated visuals to create at least two explanatory materials tailored to learners' proficiency levels.
Through reflective practice, identify at least three potential educational challenges when designing AI-integrated lessons and propose solutions.

resources: Access to generative AI tools (MATH41-like systems)
Digital resource package including math concept visualization templates
Collaborative platform for PBL (Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
